Description: Circular pendant; lead; with loop; open-work cross patée with a central boss.
Curator's comments: Parallel: I. O. Kanonidis, "Enkolpia Excavated from Late Byzantine Cemeteries in Thessaloniki", Museum of Byzantine Culture 9 (2002) 65-81: cat. 5.
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1930 / Qau and Badari III (pl. xxxix)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
